overview: The French Riviera is where the world's most beautiful women go to tan and relax. And never has it looked so beautiful as when the Vivid Girls landed on it's sunny shores: Tera! Briana! Monique! Lexie! Tawny! Mercedez! The Love Twins! Savanna! And hot little Stefani turn the town inside out and upside down as they make love in the water, on the beach, and everywhere in between in the latest installment of the biggest all-girl series in porn.
title: Where the Boys Aren't 18
